summary: This is an email chain from August 1, 2019, requesting notes from a Chief Psychologist at the Federal Bureau of Prisons regarding Jeffrey Epstein's suicide attempt. The request is marked as urgent and appears to be an internal communication seeking information on Epstein's mental health status while in custody.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email request for psychological notes regarding his suicide attempt while in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Request for Epstein suicide attempt notes
events.description: An initial request was sent to a Chief Psychologist for notes on Jeffrey Epstein's suicide attempt.

events.title: Urgent follow-up request for Epstein notes
events.description: A follow-up email marked as urgent and 'asap' was sent regarding the request for psychological notes on Epstein's suicide attempt.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: An urgent request was made on August 1, 2019, for psychological notes regarding Jeffrey Epstein's suicide attempt.
The request was directed to a Chief Psychologist at the U.S. Department of Justice/Federal Bureau of Prisons at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The initial request was sent on July 31, 2019, indicating ongoing interest in Epstein's mental health status while in custody.
The communication highlights internal efforts to gather information about Epstein's condition prior to his death.
